002224.SZ.summary: Sanlux Co., Ltd manufactures and sells various rubber V-belts. It offers classical wrapped, wedge wrapped, classical and wedge raw edge cogged, conveyor, banded classical and wedge, double, and agricultural V-belts, as well as air and water hoses. The company also provides automobile belts, such as raw edge cogged and laminated belts, raw edge plain belts, and timing and poly V-belts. It serves customers in approximately 70 countries and regions, including Europe, the United States, Asia, and Africa. Sanlux Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is based in Shaoxing, China.

002225.SZ.summary: Puyang Refractories Group Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells refractory products for the steel industry worldwide. It offers functional and amorphous refractory products; and refractory materials, such as permeable bricks, bricks, bulk materials, skateboard nozzles, magnesium carbon/aluminum magnesium carbon, etc., which are used in steel, non-ferrous smelting, power, petrochemical, foundry, and other industries. The company also provides contracting services for the design, installation, and construction of various thermal equipment refractories. It exports its products to the Americas, Europe, the Commonwealth of Independent States, Southeast Asia, Africa, the Middle East, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Puyang Refractories Limited Company and changed its name to Puyang Refractories Group Co., Ltd. in June 2007. Puyang Refractories Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Puyang, the People's Republic of China.

002229.SZ.summary: Hongbo Co., Ltd. engages in the security printing business in China. The company is also involved in the color printing of boutique albums, books, magazines, and posters; development, production, and sale of smart cards; and import and sale of olive oil and red wine. In addition, it develops, produces, and sells Internet of Things applications and related derivative products in the fields of alcohol traceability, lottery, and smart cards; and engages in the lottery and packaging businesses. The company was formerly known as Fujian Hongbo Printing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hongbo Co., Ltd. in August 2013. Hongbo Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

002236.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Dahua Technology Co., Ltd. operates in the security video surveillance industry worldwide. The company offers network, high definition composite video interface (HDCVI), PTZ, and thermal cameras; network and HDCVI recorders; video intercoms, including kits, accessories, emergency phone terminals, and IP and analog products; and access control products, such as controllers, readers, modules, accessories, and standalone and time attendance solutions. It also provides alarms; traffic enforcement, traffic signal control, entrance and exit, parking, mobile products/solutions, and related software and accessories; transmission solutions comprising PoE, ePoE, access, aggregation, and core switches, as well as related accessories and platforms; display and control solutions, including video management platform (VMP), decoders, splicing controllers, network keyboards, LCD monitors and video walls, LCD digital signage, LED displays, and interactive LCD displays; and video conferencing solutions. In addition, the company offers face recognition, vehicle analysis, event detection, structuring, and security screening servers; IP and cloud storage products; drones; machine vision solutions, such as area scan, line scan, smart, 3D measurement, and board cameras, as well as industrial lenses, code readers, train scanning systems, and vision controllers; cables and detectors; and power supply accessories, as well as related software. It serves transportation, building, retail, banking and finance, critical infrastructure, and warehousing and logistics industries, as well as the government. Zhejiang Dahua Technology Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

002248.SZ.summary: Weihai Huadong Automation Co., Ltd develops, manufactures, and sells CNC systems, CNC machine tools, and related parts in China. Its products include cylindrical grinding machines; surface grinders; vertical and horizontal milling machines; gantry grinding and milling machines; milling machines; and functional accessories. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Weihai, China.

002255.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd.
002255.SZ.summary: Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells energy saving and environmental protection equipment. The company undertakes environmental engineering projects; and offers boilers for use in various industries, such as power generation, steel making, non-ferrous, coking, petrol-chemical, chemical, and paper making. It also provides nuclear power equipment, such as basket shell, bubblers, accumulators, high temperature gas cooled reactors, hangers, etc.; heavy pressure vessels and vessels of special materials; and marine and on-land cryogenic products. The company also exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, Africa, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, and internationally. Suzhou Hailu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002268.SZ.summary: Westone Information Industry Inc. provides network information security solutions, products, and services to industrial clients and enterprise-level users in China. It offers commercial crypto products, including crypto chips, modules, devices, systems, etc.; and information security products comprising network security products, host security products, data security products, security application products, security management products, etc. The company also provides security information systems, such as mobile Internet security products, high-security terminals, wireless communication security products, etc.; and security integration and operation services consisting of consultation, planning, designing, operation, and maintenance. Westone Information Industry Inc. was founded in 1998 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002270.SZ.summary: Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd provides voltage regulation solutions in China. The company offers conventional, vacuum, dry, and gas insulated on-load tap changers; and cage and drum de-energized (off-circuit) tap changers for transformers. It also provides accessories, such as motor drive units, online oil filters, controllers, and other accessories. The company's products as used in chemical, metallurgical, and railway projects, as well as power grids, and energy and other sectors. In addition, it provides training and after-sales services. The company also exports its products to approximately 80 countries in the United States, Asia, Europe, Africa, and Oceania. The company was formerly known as Shandong FIN CNC Machine Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd in July 2016. Huaming Power Equipment Co.,Ltd was founded in 1989 is based in Shanghai, China.

002271.SZ.long_name: Beijing Oriental Yuhong Waterproof Technology Co., Ltd.
002271.SZ.summary: Beijing Oriental Yuhong Waterproof Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells waterproof materials in China. The company offers bituminous and self-adhesive waterproof membranes, waterproof coatings, rigid waterproof, system supporting, and sealing materials. It also engages in the non-woven fabric and building renovation businesses. The company's waterproofing solutions are used in buildings, roads, bridges, railways, airports, and water conservation facilities. It sells its products through home improvement companies and building material outlets to approximately 100 countries and regions, including Germany, Brazil, Venezuela, Poland, Angola, South Africa, India, etc. Beijing Oriental Yuhong Waterproof Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

002272.SZ.summary: Sichuan Crun Co., Ltd provides energy conservation and environmental protection equipment manufacturing and engineering services in the People's Republic of China. The company develops, manufactures, and sells lubrication, cooling, and hydraulic equipment; and system solutions and services primarily in various industries, such as wind power, solar power, petroleum and natural gas, etc. It also develops and manufactures waste heat recovery boilers, biomass boilers, wound tube heat exchangers, power station auxiliaries, boiler parts, etc. In addition, the company provides EPC project services for small power plants; and energy conservation and emission reduction engineering services for power plants primarily in the industry of building materials, metallurgy, thermal power, etc. Sichuan Crun Co., Ltd was founded in 1992 and is based in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

002276.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Wanma Co., Ltd. produces and sells power cables. The company offers 1-500kV XLPE, plastic, computer, low voltage, 1-35kV aerial, waterproof, underground, prefabricated branched power, and aerial insulation cables, as well as set cables for special conditions. It also provides wires and cables for electrical equipment; bare, aluminum stranded, and steel-cored aluminum stranded wires; copper and aluminum rods; special, mine, coaxial, silicon rubber, and fluorin plastic cables; and cable accessories, such as cable terminals and middle connectors. The company offers its products for use in electrical power, communication, petrochemistry, railway, metallurgy, and steel industries. It has operations in China, Southeast Asia, Japan, the United States, the European Union, and Russia. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002282.SZ.summary: Bosun Co., Ltd. researches, manufactures, and sells diamond, power, and TCT tools under the BOSUN brand name in China and internationally. The company's diamond tools comprise diamond blades, diamond cup wheels, diamond core bits, and polishing pads; and power tools include core drill machines, table and floor saws, and floor grinders. It also offers TCT tools, such as solid wood, man-made board, non-ferrous, and steel cutting saw blades, as well as general purpose woodworking products; and RTS and LBT products, laminated board cutting saw blades, and other products. The company was formerly known as Bosun Tools Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Bosun Co., Ltd. in June 2019. Bosun Co., Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

002295.SZ.summary: Guangdong Jingyi Metal Co., Ltd. engages in copper processing business in China. The company offers thread copper tubes, micro heat pipes, cable copper tubes, microwave brass tubes, and precision copper fittings for gas. It also provides supply chain trading platform. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Foshan, China.

002296.SZ.long_name: HeNan Splendor Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
002296.SZ.summary: HeNan Splendor Science & Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and promotes rail transit measurement and control technologies for the rail transit industry in China. The company's products and solutions for the national railways include railway signal centralized, hump signal centralized, railway track comprehensive, frequency shift track circuit outdoor, railway power environment, signal room UPS and battery online, railway communication tower, high-speed railway natural disaster and foreign body intrusion limit, wireless shunting locomotive signal, and railway integrated video monitoring systems. Its national railway products and solutions also comprise railway signal centralized monitoring handheld terminal systems; electric service integrated data analysis platform systems; electric heating channel snow melting system equipment; high-speed railway perimeter intrusion alarm systems; distributed self-discipline scheduling centralized systems; and train dispatching command, wireless shunting locomotive signal, electric dispatching command center, operation guarantee mobile terminal, computer interlocking, and axle counting systems. In addition, the company offers urban rail transit signal maintenance support, environment and equipment monitoring, urban rail transit integrated monitoring, urban rail transit automatic ticket inspection, CCTV monitoring, and automatic train monitoring systems for urban rail transit. Further, it provides special railway transportation command integrated systems for dedicated line railways, as well as pre- and after-sale services. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Zhengzhou, China.

002298.SZ.long_name: Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd.
002298.SZ.summary: Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. provides system integrator, equipment and integrated solution, and system operation services in China. The company offers smart city integrated management platform for security; and HD network cameras. It also provides energy storage and charging pile systems, high and low voltage power products, high and low voltage component products, automation products, transformers, power quality control products. The company offers its products under the iChinaE, SINONET, FIAMM, and other brands. The company was formerly known as Anhui Xinlong Electrical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Anhui Sinonet & Xinlong Science & Technology Co., Ltd. in December 2015. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Wuhu, China.

002300.SZ.long_name: Fujian Nanping Sun Cable Co., Ltd.
002300.SZ.summary: Fujian Nanping Sun Cable Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells wires and cables in China. It offers aluminum alloy conductor XLPE insulated power cables, mining rubber flexible cables, control cables, PVC insulated wires, PVC and XLPE insulated power cables, overhead insulated cables, and photovoltaic cables. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Nanping, China.

002301.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Comix Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells office supplies in China and internationally. The company offers filing products comprising view and ring binders; LAF products; display books; clip boards; suspension files; button and zipper bags; report, expanding, refill, box, and pressure files; file cases; indexes and dividers; and name card and card holders. It also provides desktop stationeries consisting of staplers, punches, staple removers, file boxes and trays, transparent drawers, file cabinets, book stands, pen stands, magnetic clip boxes, binder clips, colored clips and bands sets, paper clips and staples, clips and pins, scissors, utility knifes, replacement blades, key boxes, and steel scudding knifes. In addition, the company offers student stationery products, such as pencil sharpeners, scissors, erasers, rulers, stapler sets, and little polo bear series; paper products, including notebooks, easy sticks, copy papers, and note papers; and writing instruments comprising gel-ink and ball pens, pencils, permanent markers, whiteboard markers, highlighters, and refills. Further, it provides pocket, desktop, and office calculators; office equipment consisting of shredders, binding machines, laminators, laminating films, time recorders, lubrication sachets, and equipment accessories; and conference and presentation products, such as board series, white boards accessories, projection screens, laser pointers, and projector table series. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Comix Stationery Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Comix Group Co., Ltd. in September 2014. Shenzhen Comix Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002307.SZ.long_name: Xinjiang Beixin Road & Bridge Group Co., Ltd
002307.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Beixin Road & Bridge Group Co., Ltd. engages in the construction of roads and bridges in China and internationally. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Urumqi, China.

002312.SZ.long_name: Chengdu Santai Holding Group Co., Ltd.
002312.SZ.summary: Chengdu Santai Holding Group Co., Ltd. provides financial outsourcing services in China. The company offers business process combing, platform centralized management, and big data analysis and service solutions for various business processes of the banking industry. It also provides phosphorus chemical products, including industrial grade monoammonium phosphate, feed-grade calcium hydrogen phosphate, and fertilizer-grade monoammonium phosphate. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

002320.SZ.summary: Hainan Strait Shipping Co.,Ltd. engages in the sea passenger transportation business in China. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Haikou, China. Hainan Strait Shipping Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hainan Port and Waterway Holding Co., Ltd.

002322.SZ.long_name: Ningbo Ligong Environment And Energy Technology Co.,Ltd
002322.SZ.summary: Ningbo Ligong Environment And Energy Technology Co., Ltd researches, develops, sales, and services online monitoring equipment in the People's Republic of China. Its products and solutions include smart grid online monitoring, which cover substation monitoring, transmission class, scheduling class, power quality class, and others; environmental monitoring; environmental protection and power information; and environmental governance comprising heavy metal treatment, soil repair, wastewater treatment, and atmospheric desulfurization and denitrification. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Ligong Online Monitoring Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Ligong Environment And Energy Technology Co., Ltd in April 2016. Ningbo Ligong Environment And Energy Technology Co., Ltd is based in Ningbo, the People's Republic of China.

002323.SZ.summary: JiangSu Yabaite Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, and production of metal roofing envelopment systems, intelligent metal roofing systems, and distributed roofing photovoltaic power generation systems. The company is headquartered in Yancheng, China.

002325.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Hongtao Group Co., Ltd. engages in building decoration industry in China. The company offers decorative design and construction in the areas of architectural decoration, decoration design, building curtain wall, urban and road lighting, building intelligence, mechanical and electrical equipment installation, and fire protection facilities. It is also involved in the research and development, production, and sale of decorative materials. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Hongtao Decoration Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Hongtao Group Co., Ltd. in March 2019. Shenzhen Hongtao Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002328.SZ.summary: Shanghai Xinpeng Industry Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells metal electromechanical parts primarily in China. The company manufactures various kinds of tooling and metal parts through stamping and sheet metal processes. Its products include molds, motors, stampings, auto parts, and plasma base plates, as well as OEM and CNC products. The company serves multinational corporations. Shanghai Xinpeng Industry Co.,Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

002335.SZ.summary: Kehua Data Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of renewable energy and data center products under the Kehua brand name worldwide. It offers central inverters, inverter containers, and central distribution systems; energy storage systems and converters, and storage batteries; grid-tied PV and string inverters; solar controllers, off grid inverters and chargers, single and three phase inverters, and 48V inverters; charging modules, and AC and DC chargers; combiner boxes and Pb-C batteries; and other customized products. The company also provides online transformer-based, online transformer less, modular, line interactive, offline, lithium, and DC UPS; telecom inverter, static transfer switch, and industry UPS systems; and customized products comprising voltage and frequency adjustable UPS systems. In addition, it offers accessories, including 3 phase ATS racks, 3 phase bypass maintenance racks, 3 phase input racks, 3 phase lightning protection racks, 3 phase UPS distribution racks, batter racks, lead-acid batteries, MMBMs, PDU modules, single phase composite racks, single phase lightning protection racks, SNMPs, 3 phase voltage regulators, AC distribution cabinets, active power filters, battery cabinets, chargers, distribution cabinets, outdoor cabinets, power distribution cabinets, rack battery cabinets, and wall-mounted lightning protection products. Further, the company provides data center systems; and SNMP adapters, data collection devices, data center monitoring and management systems, data acquisition modules, leakage sensor modules, contact monitor modules, and GSM modules. The company was formerly known as Kehua Hengsheng Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kehua Data Co., Ltd. in January 2021. Kehua Data Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China.

002337.SZ.summary: Tianjin Saixiang Technology Co.,Ltd engages in the development and production of radial tire production equipment in China. The company also offers transportation jigs; machining systems for robot industry, including surface polishing, casting machining, welding, painting, rubber coating, assembling and transportation, etc.; and logistics system, automobile manufacturing equipment, and automobile exhibition equipment. It also exports its products to France, the United States, Germany, Japan, England, Italy, and India. Tianjin Saixiang Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 1989 and is based in Tianjin, China.

002342.SZ.summary: Juli Sling Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells rigging products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers textile slings, mooring ropes, chain slings, wire ropes, steel wire rope slings, clamp lifting beam pulleys, lifting clamps, cables, and steel tie rods; and engages in the crane and steel works. It serves the nuclear power, wind energy, hydro power, ship building, metallurgy, bridge construction, mining, aerospace, ocean engineering, machinery, transportation, port construction, spatial structure, machinery manufacturing, and other lifting industries. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Baoding, the People's Republic of China.

002347.SZ.summary: Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, markets, and services metallurgical equipment in China. The company offers industrial universal shafts, gear couplings, shear blades, sliding plates, mandrels, compactors, automobile-transmission shafts, automobile spare parts, and others. It also provides wire rod coil compactors; bar bundling, H-beam tying, strapping, and spray marking machines; and de-coilers/re-coilers, as well as compactor spare parts. The company was formerly known as Anhui Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. in February 2013. Taier Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Ma'anshan, China.

002356.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Hemei Group Co.,LTD. engages in the tourism, finance, smart technology, and Internet technology businesses in Japan and internationally. It operates 200 boutique stores that provide jewelry, men's wear, women's wear, casual wear, sportswear, children's wear, and shoes primarily in France, Italy, Germany, Switzerland, and Spain. The company also offers products and services, such as consumer loans, industrial investment, financing, financial services, brand funds, etc. In addition, it provides smart home, intelligent hardware, and new energy products; and Internet technology products. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Haoningda Meters Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenzhen Hemei Group Co.,LTD. in May 2016. Shenzhen Hemei Group Co.,LTD. was founded in 1994 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002357.SZ.long_name: Sichuan Fulin Transportation Group Co., Ltd.
002357.SZ.summary: Sichuan Fulin Transportation Group Co., Ltd. engages in the road transportation business in China. The company provides passenger, travel, charter, car rental, maintenance, and ticket inquiry, as well as advertising services. It also offers station, taxi and urban bus operations, vehicle maintenance and inspection, driver training, insurance concurrent agency, and cross-border investment services. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Chengdu, China.

002358.SZ.summary: Henan Senyuan Electric Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sales of high, medium, and low voltage power generation, transmission, and distribution equipment in China and internationally. It also researches and develops, designs, produces, constructs, installs, operates, and maintains energy power plants, port power supply facilities, energy saving, and emission reduction facilities. The company's products include charging station equipment; high and medium voltage switchgears; pre-installed transformer substation and switching station; switchgears for rail traction; medium voltage switch elements; medium/low voltage electric power quality correction equipment; microprocessor protection devices and systems; transformers; medium voltage mutual inductors and embedded poles; low voltage switch elements and switchgears; photovoltaic power generation systems; insulators; molding copper contact/rows; and intelligent independent power supply systems. Its products are used in national grid, energy, rail transit, petrochemical, building materials, municipal, medical and health, metallurgy, and other fields. Henan Senyuan Electric Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Changge, China.

002366.SZ.long_name: Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd.
002366.SZ.summary: Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd., through its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, and production of nuclear power equipment and other equipment materials. It provides equipment and materials, and services for nuclear power, energy, shipping, metallurgy, petrochemical, marine engineering, aviation, high-speed railway, nuclear reprocessing, and other areas. The company was formerly known as Danfu Compressor Co.,LTD. Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Yantai, China. Taihai Manoir Nuclear Equipment Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Yantai Taihai Group Co., Ltd.

002367.SZ.summary: Canny Elevator Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, installation, and maintenance of elevators. The company offers high speed, machine room less, panorama, hospital, freight, and home-use elevators under the CANNY brand; and heavy-duty and public traffic type escalators, as well as moving walks. It provides its products for residential and commercial, public, and other projects, as well as city complexes and hotels. The company also exports its products to approximately 100 countries and regions. Canny Elevator Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002372.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Weixing New Building Materials Co., Ltd.
002372.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Weixing New Building Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of plastic pipes in China. The company's products include PPR, PE, polypropylene-random-copolymer, PE-XB, F-PPR, and PP-R/AL pipes for water supplying applications; PE corrugated, PVC-U, and PE pipes for sewerage applications; PB-R, PE-RT II, PE-RT I, PB, and PB-XB pipes for heating applications; and hoses and plumbing accessories. It also offers HDPE same-floor drainage system, floor radiant heating system, comfortable hot water circulation system, SPM comfortable drainage system, and central hydraulic balance system solutions. The company offers its products under the Weixing, annette, and KALE brands. Zhejiang Weixing New Building Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Linhai, China.

002376.SZ.long_name: Shandong New Beiyang Information Technology Co., Ltd.
002376.SZ.summary: Shandong New Beiyang Information Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of thermal printing, identification, and smart system integration products in China. Its products include teller cash recyclers, automatic sorting systems, smart vending lockers, smart food pickup lockers, smart micro market products, embedded scanners, cash deposit modules, bank note sorters, parcel lockers, embedded scanners and printers, industrial and desktop label printers, label and receipt mobile printers, thermal receipt printers, kiosk impact and label printers, scale printers, kiosk thermal printers, impact receipt printers, and scale printers. The company also manufactures and installs parcel lockers in residential communities, office buildings, campuses, and retail centers, as well as offers hardware and software solutions, including installation, operation, and maintenance services. It serves logistics, finance, and other industries. The company also exports its products to various countries and regions in Europe, North America, and the Asia-Pacific. Shandong New Beiyang Information Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1988 and is based in Weihai, China.

002388.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Sunyes Electronic Manufacturing Holding Co., Ltd.
002388.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Sunyes Electronic Manufacturing Holding Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development of electronic manufacturing solutions, and provision of services for electronic manufacturing systems in China and internationally. The company offers soldering equipment, such as soldering stations, lead-free solder bars/wires, rework stations, soldering pots, desoldering pumps, solder wire stands, smoke absorbers, electric irons, hot air guns, thermometers, and system testers. It also provides fastening technology products comprising electric screwdrivers, electric power supplies, torque meters, digital force gauges, automatic screw suppliers, torque screwdrivers, dispensing controllers, tape dispensers, and ceramic screwdrivers. In addition, the company offers antistatic technology products, including ionizing blowers and air guns, surface resistance testers, wrist strap testers, multi-functional testers, and body antistatic products, as well as antistatic wrist straps, brushes, tweezers, and racks. Further, it provides optical technology products consisting of magnifying lamps and magnifiers; moisture-proof cabinets; and hand tools and other products, such as pliers, counters, spring balances, alcohol bottles, and others. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002392.SZ.summary: Beijing Lier High-temperature Materials Co.,Ltd. produces and sells various refractories for the iron and steel, and coal chemical industries. The company offers ladle, blast furnace, and tundish refractories; refractories for heating furnaces; and refractory materials for converters and electric furnaces, and waste incinerators, as well as the non-ferrous metallurgical industry. It also provides casting function series refractory materials, including tundish upper nozzles, long nozzles, stopper rods, and immersion nozzles for thin slab continuous casting, as well as tundish nozzles with zirconium; and refractory insulation fiber products. The company has operations in China, Russia, Ukraine, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, India, Thailand, and internationally. Beijing Lier High-temperature Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.

002426.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Victory Precision Manufacture Co., Ltd.
002426.SZ.summary: Suzhou Victory Precision Manufacture Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of precision mechanical modules primarily in China. The company's products are used in TV stands, TV front bezels and back covers, and notebooks. It serves a range of TV brands and manufacturers. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002430.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Oxygen Plant Group Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells air separation units, petrochemical equipment, and industrial gases worldwide. It offers air separation equipment; air turbine compressors; steam heaters, adsorbers, three-bar valves, and other products; cooling systems; heat exchange and rectification systems; oxygen and nitrogen compressor units; liquid storage systems; and pump valve products. The company's petrochemical equipment include ethylene cold boxes, liquid nitrogen washing devices, liquefied natural gas plants, alkane dehydrogenation olefin plants, cold box separation systems, methanol to olefin devices, and CO/H2 separation devices. It also provides oxygen, nitrogen, argon, carbon dioxide and other conventional gases; and rare gases, such as antimony, bismuth, and other special gases for use in the petroleum, chemical, steel, non-ferrous metals, electronics, food, health, medical, biopharmaceutical, and other industries. In addition, the company offers environmental protection equipment, steel structural engineering, non-ferrous metal castings, cryogenic liquid transportation vehicles, and various types of process compressors. Further, it undertakes air-contracting and general contracting projects. The company was formerly known as HANGZHOU HANGYANG Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hangzhou Oxygen Plant Group Co.,Ltd. in December 2019. Hangzhou Oxygen Plant Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is based in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002431.SZ.summary: Palm Eco-Town Development Co., Ltd. engages in the design, planning, construction, and operation of eco-towns in China and internationally. The company also constructs art gardens; and provides design and landscaping services. In addition, it is involved in the provision of design touchdown services for various design institutions, as well as in nursery business. The company was formerly known as Palm Landscape Architecture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Palm Eco-Town Development Co., Ltd. in April 2016. Palm Eco-Town Development Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002435.SZ.long_name: Changjiang Runfa Health Industry Co., Ltd.
002435.SZ.summary: Changjiang Runfa Health Industry Co., Ltd. researches and develops, produces, sells, and services elevator system components in China and internationally. It offers solid guide rails used for vertical lift solid main rail tracks; rough guides for the processing of T-type solids; hollow guide rails for use in vertical sub-tracks; ladder rails for escalator rail and moving walkways; rail blanks; and elevator guide rails. The company also provides elevator parts, such as rail frames, weight boxes, upper and lower beams, columns, hanging round the doors, door rails, buffers, door pockets, door openers, connecting plates, pressure plates, whip guides, etc. In addition, it offers escalator parts, including sprockets, chains, aprons, inside and outside covers, upper and lower stills, truss, rails guides, guide wheels, brackets, bottom-oriented products, school-foot board brackets, and other parts. The company was formerly known as Changjiang Runfa Medicine Co., Ltd.. Changjiang Runfa Health Industry Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002438.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Shentong Valve Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells special valves in China and internationally. The company primarily offers butterfly valves, ball valves, gate valves, stop valves, check valves, control valves, special valves, etc. Its products are used in the fields of metallurgy, nuclear power, thermal power, chemical processing of coal, petroleum and natural gas gathering and transportation, petroleum refining and chemical, sea water desalination, etc. Jiangsu Shentong Valve Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Qidong, China.

002457.SZ.long_name: Ningxia Qinglong Pipes Industry Group Co., Ltd.
002457.SZ.summary: Ningxia Qinglong Pipes Industry Group Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells concrete pressure water transmission pipes in China. Its products include prestressed concrete steel cylinder pipes, rebar-wound concrete steel cylinder pressure pipes, prestressed concrete pipes, and reinforced concrete drain pipes; impact-modified and hard polyvinyl chloride, and polyethylene pipes for water supply; steel mesh skeleton plastic composite pipes; and PE-RTII heat-resistant polyethylene heating pipes. The company also provides buried high density polyethylene piping systems for gas; intelligent water saving irrigation systems; ductile iron pipes; and urban underground integrated pipes. Its products are primarily used in water conservancy, electric power, urban water supply and drainage, water conservation, irrigation, urban gas transmission and distribution, and heating and transportation projects. The company was formerly known as Ningxia Qinglong Pipes Industry Co.,LTD. and changed its name to Ningxia Qinglong Pipes Industry Group Co., Ltd. in February 2020. Ningxia Qinglong Pipes Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is based in Yinchuan, China.

002469.SZ.summary: Shandong Sunway Petrochemical Engineering Co.,Ltd engages in the design, consulting, and EPC contracting in petrochemical/coal chemical industry in China. Its projects include AGO unit/VGO units, catalytic cracking units, FCC, hydrogenation units, and sulfur recovery units. The company also offers building engineering services; engineering consulting services; and design services for pressure vessels and pressure pipelines. Shandong Sunway Petrochemical Engineering Co.,Ltd was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.

002480.SZ.summary: Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co.,LTD provides system integration products and services to the public transportation and civil construction fields. The company offers rail transit systems; energy vehicles, including electric fast-charging city buses and logistics vehicles; and bridge functional components, such as bridge bearings, bridge expansion devices, pre-stressed anchors, and other products. It also provides traffic environment governance products comprising metal and non-metallic sound barriers, transparent sound insulation boards, wind barriers, light barriers, and other products; and solutions for land traffic safety operations and management of geological disasters. The company also exports its bridge functional components to Europe, Asia, Africa, and the Middle East. Chengdu Xinzhu Road&Bridge Machinery Co.,LTD was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Chengdu, China.

002483.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Rainbow Heavy Industries Co., Ltd.
002483.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Rainbow Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in equipment manufacturing, and energy conservation and environmental protection businesses worldwide. It offers a range of material lifting, offshore equipment, marine equipment, car parking equipment, engineering vessels, and other related products. The company offers its cranes under the GENMA brand. It also provides industrial wastewater treatment, sludge treatment, and hazardous solid waste disposal, as well as energy saving and recycling services. Jiangsu Rainbow Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Nantong, China.

002484.SZ.summary: Nantong Jianghai Capacitor Co. Ltd. engages in the manufacture, sale, and service of capacitors, related materials, and accessories in the People's Republic of China. The company offers aluminum electrolytic capacitors, including screw type, snap-in, radial, and polymer capacitors; film capacitors, such as DC-link and snubber capacitors; and super capacitors comprising radial, snap-in, and coin type capacitors. Its products are used in various fields, including industrial automation, power supply, consumer electronics, lifting equipment, transportation, and new energy sectors. The company also exports its products. Nantong Jianghai Capacitor Co. Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Nantong, the People's Republic of China.

002487.SZ.summary: Dajin Heavy Industry Corporation manufactures and sells steel structures in the onshore and offshore energy industry primarily in China. It offers onshore products, including onshore wind towers and other steel structure products; and offshore products consisting of offshore monopiles transition pieces, tripods, jackets, secondary steels, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Fuxin, China.

002491.SZ.summary: Tongding Interconnection Information Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of optical preform, fibers and cables, various types of communication cables, and communication devices in the People's Republic of China. It also provides network security equipment and services, big data analysis and operation services, etc. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Tongding Optic-Electronic Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Tongding Interconnection Information Co., Ltd. in January 2015. The company is based in Wujiang, the People's Republic of China.

002498.SZ.summary: Qingdao Hanhe Cable Co.,Ltd researches and develops, manufactures, and supplies cables and wires primarily in the People's Republic of China. The company offers power cables, cable accessories, submarine cables, optical power composite cables, electrical equipment wires and cables, overhead conductors, communication cables, radio-frequency cables, bus bar and prefabricated branch cables, nuclear plant cables, fire-resistant cables, and DC series cables. It also provides shipboard and mining cables, heat-resistant and high-strength aluminum alloy wires, carbon fiber wires, data cables, oil platform cables, wind farm cables, and flame retardant cables, as well as services of laying, installation, and completion test for cables and cable accessories. In addition, the company offers high-voltage electrical equipment status monitoring products for smart transformer substations and cable fault testing systems; electrical equipment testing services for customers in power, metallurgy, chemical and petroleum industries; electric power design, engineering, and installation services; and operation maintenance services for transformer substations. Its products are used in the fields of power, metallurgy, telecommunication, railway, petroleum and chemical, coal mining, construction, etc. The company also exports its products to approximately 30 countries and regions. Qingdao Hanhe Cable Co.,Ltd was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Qingdao, the People's Republic of China.

002499.SZ.summary: Kelin Environmental Protection Equipment, Inc. manufactures and sells environmental protection equipment in China. It offers bag filters, bag and electrical filters, desulfurization and denitration equipment, dry and wet electrostatic precipitators, ultra-high temperature filters, cyclone equipment, small filters, furnace shell equipment, cooling equipment, electrical and control equipment, conveying equipment, and auxiliary products. The company also provides EPC services. Its products are used in metallurgical, power, solid waste incineration, grain, building material, light industry chemical, non-ferrous metal, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Wujiang Baodai Dedusting Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kelin Environmental Protection Equipment, Inc. in 2007. Kelin Environmental Protection Equipment, Inc. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002514.SZ.summary: Suzhou Boamax Technologies Group Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells industrial grade structural CNC sheet metal products. It offers flue gas flow monitoring equipment used in the field of environmental protection, such as online monitoring about gas velocity, as well as pulverized coal flow rate and online monitoring of wind speed. The company also provides high voltage electrode boilers for the nuclear power project and for the enterprises and institutions to provide steam and hot water; and coal to electricity central heating projects that comprise integrated high voltage electrode boilers, off-peak electricity, energy storage technology, and other resources. In addition, it offers automation wet process equipment for the production of crystalline solar silicon cells; and precise sheet metal products for use in various fields, including electrical, communications, finance, medical, renewable energy, automotive, and other related fields. Suzhou Boamax Technologies Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Suzhou, China.

002518.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen KSTAR Science and Technology Co., Ltd.
002518.SZ.summary: Shenzhen KSTAR Science and Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells data center infrastructure products in the People's Republic of China. The company offers data center products, such as UPS, battery, and precision cooling products, as well as integrated solutions for use in finance, communication, government, enterprise, and data center construction fields. It also provides PV inverters, including string, energy storage, central, container, monitoring, and combiner box inverters, as well as residential and commercial PV, and utility PV inverter solutions. Shenzhen KSTAR Science and Technology Co., Ltd. also offers its products and services to approximately 90 countries worldwide. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, the People's Republic of China.

002520.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang RIFA Precision Machinery Co., Ltd.
002520.SZ.summary: Zhejiang RIFA Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells CNC machine tools in China the United States, France, Poland, Japan, and internationally. The company offers CNC vertical and horizontal machining centers, CNC vertical and horizontal lathes, CNC gantry machining centers, floor type boring machines, and specialized grinding machines. It serves boiler, mining, and wind industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Xinchang, China. ZheJiang RIFA Precision Machinery Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Zhejiang Rifa Holding Group Co., Ltd.

002523.SZ.summary: Zhuzhou Tianqiao Crane Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies various special use cranes for steel, aluminum smelting, power, nuclear, and other industries in China and internationally. The company primarily offers transfer gantry systems, pot tending machines, baking furnace tending machines, beam lifting machines, bridge erecting machines, casting cranes, electric magnetic cranes, gantry cranes, portal harbor cranes, slab clamping cranes, EOT cranes, and other products, as well as special purposed cranes for copper and lead melting. It also provides technical assistance, erection and commissioning, training, and availability confirmation services, as well as refurbishment, retrofit, and upgradation services; and supplies and stores spare parts. The company was founded in 1958 and is based in Zhuzhou, China.

002529.SZ.summary: Fujian Haiyuan Composites Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of hydraulic press equipment and related devices in China and internationally. It provides automatic hydraulic ceramic water-permeable plaza tile presses, autoclaved brick and AAC products, composite materials related equipment, ceramic tile related equipment, refractory materials related equipment, and automotive related equipment, as well as eante fiber reinforced thermoplastic composite formwork and automotive related products. The company was formerly known as Fujian Haiyuan Automatic Equipments Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fujian Haiyuan Composites Technology Co.,Ltd. in August 2018. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Fuzhou, China.

002532.SZ.summary: Tianshan Aluminum Co., Ltd. of the 8th Division of Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps primarily engages in the production and sale of aluminum deep-processed products and materials, prebaked anodes, high-purity aluminum, and alumina. It sells self-produced and purchased aluminum ingots that are used as raw materials for downstream aluminum processing; aluminum sheets and foils; and aluminum alloy materials for use in production and manufacturing applications. Tianshan Aluminum Co., Ltd of the 8th Division of Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps was formerly known as Xinjiang Production and Construction Corps Agricultural Division Eight Xinjiang Tianshan Aluminum Plant Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2010 and is based in Shihezi, China.

002534.SZ.summary: Hangzhou Boiler Group Co., Ltd. and its subsidiaries consult, develop, produce, sell, and install boilers, pressure vessels, environment protection equipment, new energy equipment, and other products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. Its products include CCPP HRSG boilers; heat recovery boiler for metallurgic industry; and HRSG for chemical industry and constructional material. The company's products also comprise utility boilers, such as circulating fluidized bed boilers, pulverized coal utility boilers, BFG boilers, and water-coal slurry boilers; special and industrial boilers, which comprise biomass boilers, pure refuse incineration boilers and CFB refuses, hot water boilers, and chain stoker boilers; utility auxiliary products, such as HP heaters, LP feed water heaters, deaerators, and condensers; and flue-gas purifier, coal chemicals, and others. In addition, it is involved in the refuse incineration treatment projects; co-generation, CCPP, and waste heat recovery/MSW/biomass/BFG/coal combustion power generation; research and development, manufacture, marketing, construction, and EPC service of waste heat recovery boilers, power plant boilers, industrial boilers, pressure vessels, etc.; and design and manufacture of boiler auxiliaries, various special equipment, and heavy-duty equipment. Further, it provides industrial automatic technology consulting, design development, supply, commissioning, and technical services for equipment; and professional personnel for machinery manufacturing industry. The company was founded in 1955 and is based in Hangzhou, the People's Republic of China.

002535.SZ.long_name: Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co., Ltd
002535.SZ.summary: Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co., Ltd manufactures and sells coal mining machinery and equipment in China. The company offers roadheaders, shearers, belt conveyors, scraper conveyors, metal top beams, fluid couplings, rescue cabins, and hydraulic brackets. It also provides iron and steel casting and forging, energy equipment, high-tech equipment, mine construction and operation, and financial leasing services. In addition, the company engages in the explosion-proof electrical appliances; robotic product manufacturing, sales, maintenance, and leasing; iron pig foundry; and commercial factoring businesses. Linzhou Heavy Machinery Group Co., Ltd was founded in 1987 and is based in Linzhou, China.

002541.SZ.long_name: Anhui Honglu Steel Construction(Group) CO., LTD
002541.SZ.summary: Anhui Honglu Steel Construction(Group) CO., LTD manufactures and sells steel structures and related products in China and internationally. It offers steel structures for industrial buildings, steel structures for residences, and customized bungalows. The company also produces and sells building materials and three-dimensional garages. In addition, it engages in the industrial real estate investment and construction operations; and green steel structural property development activities. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hefei, China.

002542.SZ.long_name: China Zhonghua Geotechnical Engineering Group Co., Ltd.
002542.SZ.summary: China Zhonghua Geotechnical Engineering Group Co., Ltd. engages in the engineering, general aviation, cultural tourism, and investment businesses in China. The company provides geotechnical engineering services, including engineering survey, design consultation, construction, monitoring and inspection, engineering supervision, and related services; and underground engineering services for foundation pit support, underground diaphragm walls, shield tunnels, and construction machinery manufacturing, as well as undertakes municipal engineering projects, such as roads, bridges, and underground pipe networks. It also offers engineering consulting, planning and design, project investment and management, construction, operation, maintenance, and other related services for airports and general aviation airports. In addition, the company engages in the planning, design, investment, development, and construction of cultural tourism towns, theme parks, general aviation towns, and related projects. Further, it invests in cultural media, electronic chip technology, Internet finance, big data, and other industries. China Zhonghua Geotechnical Engineering Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Beijing, China.

002546.SZ.summary: Nanjing Xinlian Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets electricity information collection systems for the power industry in China. The company provides intelligent power distribution equipment and systems, and distribution automation equipment. It also offers energy management systems, smart energy cloud platforms, power cabinet systems, low-voltage complete sets, and power communication detection systems. In addition, the company provides integrated energy services and solutions to grid enterprises and enterprise users. Nanjing Xinlian Electronics Co., Ltd. is based in Nanjing, China.

002552.SZ.summary: Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of various forgings and castings in China. It offers products for mining machinery, electric power engineering, technology, ocean engineering, and hoisting machinery. The company's products are primarily used in shipbuilding, ocean-engineering, power station, petrochemical, engineering machinery, pressure vessels, military, and other industries. It also exports its products to Germany, France, Finland, Canada, Singapore, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Baoding Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2016. Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002559.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd.
002559.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells metal forming machine tools in China and internationally. Its products include smart and automatic products, such as CNC turret punching machines, CNC press brakes, CNC laser cutting machines, flexible cells and systems, automatic coil lines, and linear and horizontal multi-joint robots. The company also offers sheet metal processing machine-tools; laser processing equipment; and coil line equipment. It serves sheet metal, electric, elevator and escalator, and curtain wall industries. Jiangsu Yawei Machine Tool Co., Ltd. was founded in 1956 and is based in Yangzhou, China.

002560.SZ.summary: Henan Tong-Da Cable Co., Ltd. manufactures and supplies conductors, wires, and cables in China and internationally. Its bare conductors include aluminum conductor steel reinforced (ACSR), aluminum conductor aluminum clad steel reinforced, and all aluminum alloy conductor steel reinforced products, as well as galvanized steel wire and strand bare conductors for power transmission lines; anti-corrosion/greased ACSR products for use in bad weather conditions; all aluminum conductors for overhead power transmission and distribution lines; and all aluminum alloy conductors for primary and secondary distribution. Its bare conductors also comprise aluminum conductor steel supported and steel supported-trapezoidal wire products for overhead distribution and transmission lines; aluminum clad steel wire/alumoweld products for application in transmission lines, coastal areas, and islands, as well as hot, humid, salt fog, and polluted regions; thermal resistant aluminum-alloy conductor steel reinforced products for overhead transmission lines and distribution wires; and aluminum conductor aluminum alloy reinforced products. In addition, it offers covered line wires for overhead power distribution lines; duplex service drop products for application in street and outdoor lighting, and temporary service for construction; triplex and quadruplex service drop products to supply power from a pole-mounted transformer to the user's service head; and covered aluminum cables. Further, it provides XHHW-2, RHH/RHW-2/USE, PVC and XLPE insulated power, rubber sheathed flexible, mining, welding, and control cables, as well as PVC insulated wires for use in overload and short circuit conditions. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Zhengzhou, China.

002564.SZ.summary: SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd engages in the research and development and application of clean energy and environmental protection technologies in China and internationally. The company offers equipment, such as coal chemical, petrochemical, fine chemical, metallurgy, and nuclear power equipment; marine and military equipment; and renewable and clean energy equipment. It also provides thermal, solar, and biomass power generation services; and EPC engineering consulting services, as well as constructs power projects. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Tianwo Science and Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd in March 2015. SuZhou THVOW Technology. Co. ,Ltd is based in Zhangjiagang, China.

002576.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells stators and rotors, and laminations for motors and generators primarily in China. The company offers stators and rotors for wind power generators; HV and LV, and other special-sized motors; generator products; laminations and cores; and electromotor lamination stator dies, precise compound dies, single punching dies, aluminum rotor die-casting molds, and machine parts and components of precision dies and automatic lines. Jiangsu Tongda Power Technology Co.,Ltd. is based in Tongzhou, China.

002580.SZ.long_name: Shandong Sacred Sun Power Sources Co., Ltd.
002580.SZ.summary: Shandong Sacred Sun Power Sources Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and distributes reserve power and motive power batteries worldwide. Its reserve power batteries are used in the telecom and utility industries, uninterruptible power supplies, and various applications requiring stored energy solutions, including solar and wind renewable energy; and motive power batteries are used in electric forklifts and other commercial electric powered vehicles. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Qufu, China.

002586.SZ.long_name: Zhejiang Reclaim Construction Group Co., Ltd.
002586.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Reclaim Construction Group Co., Ltd. engages in the seawall construction business in China. It undertakes water conservancy, hydro power project construction, port and waterway engineering, housing construction, municipal general construction, and blasting and dismantling professional contract services. The company is based in Ningbo, China.

002592.SZ.summary: Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of copper and aluminum tube-fin heat exchanger products in Mainland China. It offers aluminum and copper cooling tubes, zigzag fins, single and double corrugated fins, and out-road fins; and passenger car air heater blowers, passenger car and bus intercoolers, and heavy duty truck intercoolers. The company also provides bus radiators, computer CPU radiators, aluminum and copper passenger car radiators, engineering machine radiators, and aluminum and copper heavy duty truck radiators; and passenger car and bus cooling modules. Its products are used in automobile, engineering machinery, defense equipment, and computer fields. The company also exports its products primarily to the United States and Australia. Nanning Baling Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Nanning, China.

002595.SZ.long_name: Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd
002595.SZ.summary: Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd manufactures and sells tire molds in China and internationally. It also offers gas turbine casings, castings, and rubber machinery. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Gaomi, China. Himile Mechanical Science and Technology (Shandong) Co., Ltd is a subsidiary of Himile Group Co.,Ltd.

002598.SZ.summary: Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd manufactures and sells various blowers. Its principal products include root and turbo blowers, centrifugal blowers and fans, slurry and industrial pumps, liquid ring vacuum pumps, mills, and pneumatic conveying equipment and systems. The company exports its products to approximately 70 countries, including the European Union and North America. It offers blowers to its distributors, OEMs, and end users. Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Shandong Zhangqiu Blower Factory Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1968 and is based in Jinan, China.

002613.SZ.summary: Luoyang Northglass Technology Co.,Ltd designs, develops, and manufactures glass deep processing equipment in China. The company's deep processing equipment comprise glass tempering furnaces, low-e coating machines, glass automation systems, glass cutting machines, glass storage systems, buffer systems, vertical glass seaming machines, and vertical washing machines. It also offers deep processed glass products, such as toughened, laminated, curved, insulating, printed, and coated glass products; and HVLS and general fans. The company also exports its products to approximately 80 countries, such as the United States, the United Kingdom, Germany, France, Japan, Russia, the Middle East, Southeast Asia, etc. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Luoyang, China.

002617.SZ.summary: Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the research, development, manufacture, sale of electromagnetic products in China. The company's principal products include composite enameled copper round wires, variable frequency enameled copper round wires, self-adhesive enameled copper round wires, corona enamelled copper round wires, enameled round aluminum wires, and various ultra-fine enameled wires. Its products are used in the home appliance, electric power, telecommunication, electronic, medical equipment, automobile, wind power generation, power supply equipment, and aerospace fields. The company also offers motors. In addition, it invests in, designs, constructs, operates, services, and distributes photovoltaic power plants. The company also exports its products to the United States, Brazil, Japan, Italy, Mexico, and Slovakia. Roshow Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1984 and is based in Zhuji, China.

002620.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd.
002620.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd. operates as a construction and decoration company in China. The company is involved in the design and construction of architectural decorations and curtain walls, as well as solar photovoltaic power generation and construction installation activities; and provision of electromechanical engineering, fire protection, landscape, and intelligent technology services. It undertakes public infrastructure, hotel and club, finance and securities, business entertainment, transportation facilities, business office, and exhibit and theater projects. The company was formerly known as Shenzhen Ruihe Decoration Engineering Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Ruihe Construction Decoration Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

002621.SZ.long_name: Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd.
002621.SZ.summary: Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells corrugated pipe production equipment in Southeast Asia, the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and the United States. The company offers plastic machinery products, such as HDPE/PP double wall and high-speed corrugated, solid, PE, PVC, and HDPE corrugated pipe extrusion lines, as well as belling machines, perforators, and extruder series machinery. It also provides general machinery products. The company was formerly known as Dalian Sunlight Machinery Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Dalian My Gym Education Technology Co., Ltd. In April 2019. The company is based in Dalian, China.

002622.SZ.summary: Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. engages in electrical equipment, credit information big data, commercial bank and factoring, financing leasing, and other businesses in China. The company offers electrical equipment products, such as electronic control complete sets, permanent magnet low and high voltage switch products, and electronic energy meters, as well as highway part facility, automatic control system integration, and protection services. It also provides credit services, including credit management and rating system services; and digital retail management solutions consisting of channel collaborative retail management and large data operations management services, as well as product development services for online and offline enterprises. In addition, the company offers banking services comprising corporate and personal finance, small microfinance, financial market, and international business services; business factoring services, which include advance payment under warranty, factoring under credit protection, leasing factoring, re-factoring, and other services; and financial leasing services, such as direct, after-sale, entrusted, leveraged, and joint leasing services. Further, it provides insurance brokerage services primarily student and family insurance. The company was formerly known as Jilin Yongda Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. in November 2016. Rongyu Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in Jilin City, China.

002627.SZ.long_name: Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Co., Ltd.
002627.SZ.summary: Hubei Yichang Transportation Group Co., Ltd. provides road passenger transportation services in China. The company offers intercity bus passenger transportation, as well as tourism services. It is also involved in the vehicles and spare parts sale, and after-sales service business; and provision of logistics services, such as warehousing, loading and unloading, and freight transportation services. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Yichang, China.

002633.SZ.summary: Shenke Slide Bearing Corporation manufactures and sells bearings for use in AC and DC motors, generators, turbines, fans, pumps, compressors, and other rotating machines in China. The company offers hydro, thermal, nuclear, wind, and other mechanical products, as well as plain bearing. It serves machinery, chemical, power, steel, water conservancy, metallurgy, mining, cement, and other industries. The company also exports its products to Pakistan, Turkey, India, Japan, Australia, Bangladesh, Britain, and other countries. Shenke Slide Bearing Corporation was founded in 1996 and is based in Zhuji, China.

002639.SZ.summary: Fujian Snowman Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, and distribution of ice machines in China. The company's principal products include industrial chillers and concrete cooling systems, as well as flake, tube, block, and plate ice machines. It also offers slurry ice and quick frozen machines, compressors, cold storage panels, evaporative condensers, and air coolers. The company provides its products for use in food processing and storage; man-made ski slopes; and cooling applications in construction, supermarkets, ocean fishing, nuclear projects, chemical and medical industries, etc. It offers its products under the SNOWKEY brand name. The company was formerly known as Change City Snowman Refrigeration Equipment Co., Ltd. Fujian Snowman Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Fuzhou, China.

002641.SZ.summary: Yonggao Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic valve and fitting in China. The company offers hot products, including PVC pressure pipes and fittings, couplings, true union ball valves, butterfly valves, compact ball valves, sockets, elbows, rain gutters, male thread TEE, two-faucet reducing joint 2, and glue for water supply products. It also provides CPVC valves, plastic valves and fittings, CPVC pressure pipes and fittings, PVC gutters and fittings, PP-R pipes and fittings for cold hot water, PP compression fittings, PVC pressure pipes and fittings, PVC pipes and fittings for drainage, PVC DWV fittings, PVC thread fittings, PVC-U insulating electrical pipes and fittings, saddles, pressure fittings with gasket, and glue. The company also exports its products to approximately 146 countries. Yonggao Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Taizhou, China.

002645.SZ.long_name: Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd.
002645.SZ.summary: Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells processing equipment for recycling resources in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company primarily offers scrap metal balers, shears, scrap metal shredders, waste automobile dismantling equipment, non-metal balers, and compressors, as well as household garbage products. Its products are applied to the national circular economy parks, national urban renewable resource bases, steel and nonferrous metal enterprises, waste steel processing centers, and household garbage processing centers. Jiangsu Huahong Technology Stock Co., Ltd. is based in Jiangyin, the People's Republic of China.

002651.SZ.summary: Chengdu Leejun Industrial Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, sells, and services material grinding and separation systems in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company offers roller presses and separators for use in the cement raw material, clinker grinding, metallurgical mining, and other fields. It also provides technical services; and spare parts for a range of products and auxiliary equipment. Chengdu Leejun Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Chengdu, the People's Republic of China.

002663.SZ.summary: Pubang Landscape Architecture Co., Ltd engages in the landscape planning and design, seedling plantation, landscape architectural, garden conservation, and environmental protection businesses primarily in China. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.

002665.SZ.summary: Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and erection of air cooling system of power plant in China. The company offers direct air cooling condensers, evaporators, waste water zero emission systems, solar power tower systems, parabolic trough systems, and dish solar thermal power system. It also engages in waste heat generation, and waste heat heating and hot water activities. The company was formerly known as Beijing Shouhang Resources Saving Co.,Ltd and changed its name to Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. in December 2019. Shouhang High-Tech Energy Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

002667.SZ.long_name: Anshan Heavy Duty Mining Machinery Co., Ltd.
002667.SZ.summary: Anshan Heavy Duty Mining Machinery Co., Ltd. operates in the vibrating screen industry in China and internationally. The company manufactures and sells vibrating screens and feeders, crushers, asphalt and stabilized soil mixing plants, crushing and screening systems, garbage sorting and disposal systems, construction industrialization systems, and dry tailing systems, as well as equipment for manufacturing precast concrete components. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Anshan, China.

002671.SZ.summary: Shandong Longquan Pipeline Engineering Co.,LTD produces and sells prestressed concrete cylinder pipes in China. The company also offers reinforced concrete pipes, jacking construction method of steel tube concrete pipes, armored joint prestressed concrete cylinder pipes, ballastless track plates, precast concrete lining segments, ductile iron pipes, steel wire skeleton plastic composite pipes and fittings, drainage steel reinforced polyethylene spiral bellows, and high density polyethylene pipes. In addition, it provides fittings, such as elbow and stone accessories, steel conversion members, steel repair parts, and tee accessories. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Zibo, China.

002684.SZ.long_name: Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd.
002684.SZ.summary: Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells lead batteries and fittings, plastic products, and related products primarily in China. Its lead batteries comprise gel nanotechnology, sealed activated AGM, and factory activated maintenance free batteries; maintenance free batteries with acid packs; and high performance and conventional dry charge batteries. The company offers its products for motorcycles and vehicle starting, electric vehicles, back-up power, telecommunication and lightening, storage power, etc. It sells its products under the MENSHY, DYNAVOLT, etc. brands in approximately 90 countries. The company was formerly known as Dynavolt Renewable Power Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Guangdong Dynavolt Renewable Energy Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Shantou, China.

002685.SZ.long_name: Wuxi Huadong Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd.
002685.SZ.summary: Wuxi Huadong Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and installs container handling equipment in the People's Republic of China. The company offers ship-to-shore container cranes, rail-mounted container gantry cranes, rubber-tired container gantry cranes, general gantry cranes, portal cranes, and other cranes for use in the port container handling operations, railway container handling operations, container yard storage, trailer handling operations, forklift handling operations, etc. It also researches, develops, manufactures, markets, and services automated and intelligent precision processing equipment; and processes and trades in stainless steel products. Wuxi Huadong Heavy Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Wuxi, the People's Republic of China.

002686.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Yilida Ventilator Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sales of central air conditioner and building fans in China and internationally. It offers industrial fans, energy-saving motorized fan systems, ventilations, and axial fans. The company also provides automobile charger, DC converter, and other products that are used in electric vehicles, forklifts, golf carts, solar power, wind and electric power communications, rail systems, and other industries, as well as lightweight components, such as automotive transmission housing, engine box, retarder housing, etc. In addition, it offers vessel and marine protective, function, and composite materials for military and civilian markets; testing and checking facilities; and support services. The company offers its products under the Yilida, Wolter, Fulihua, Maer, ESSENTEC, AMMT, TC Charger, and Sanjin brand names. Zhejiang Yilida Ventilator Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

002689.SZ.long_name: Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd.
002689.SZ.summary: Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, installs, and services elevators, escalators, and passenger conveyors in the People's Republic of China and internationally. It offers passenger, panoramic, bed, and freight elevators; and home and dumbwaiter lifts. The company was formerly known as ShenYang Brilliant Elevator Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. in December 2015. Shenyang Yuanda Intellectual Industry Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Shenyang, the People's Republic of China.

002690.SZ.summary: Hefei Meyer Optoelectronic Technology Inc. researches, develops, and sells optical sorting and X-ray inspection technologies. The company offers belt-type multi-function, chute multi-function, grain, herbs, mineral stone, nut, peanut, plastic infrared, pulses, rice, salt, seeds, sesame, spices, tea, vegetable, and wheat sorters. It also provides X-ray inspection machines for canned food, dehydrated vegetable, frozen food, meat, mushroom, seafood, shoes/clothes/bags, snacks, and tire inspection, as well as security inspection. In addition, the company offers double layer, pre-sale, helpdesk, onsite, warranty, spare parts, and training services. It primarily serves agricultural products processing, industrial inspection, and healthcare industries in approximately 100 countries. Hefei Meyer Optoelectronic Technology Inc. was founded in 1993 and is based in Hefei, China.

002691.SZ.summary: Jikai Equipment Manufacturing Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, distributes, and services underground mining machinery in China. The company provides specialized solutions in underground mining industry for tunneling, tunnel supporting, transportation, etc. Its products include transport machinery, such as heavy duty scraper conveyors, durable alloy whole founded AFC pans, man transporters, reducers for coal mine scraper conveyors, and diesel crawler carriers; and mining and tunneling machinery accessory tools, including road headers and shearers, as well as picks for use in coal shearers and road headers. The company also offers safety drill machines comprising deep hole hydraulic jumbos, hydraulic drilling rigs, hydraulic coal mine tunnel drilling machines, coal mine pneumatic deep hole drilling jumbos, pneumatic bracket drilling rigs and machines, and slurry pumps. In addition, it provides supporting equipment and tools consisting of pneumatic and hydraulic series products, hydraulic props, and tensioning and auxiliary equipment. Jikai Equipment Manufacturing Co., Ltd. is based in Shijiazhuang, China.

002706.SZ.summary: Shanghai Liangxin Electrical Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and produces low-voltage electrical apparatus in China. The company offers frame breakers, molded case circuit breakers, dual power supply products, disconnectors, miniature circuit breakers, and electromagnetic circuit breakers. It also provides industrial products comprising contactors, contactor relays, switch capacitor contactors, starters, switches, thermal relays, and motor protection circuit breakers. It serves the energy, telecommunications, construction, electricity, industrial, and other industries. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

002717.SZ.summary: LingNan Eco&Culture-Tourism Co.,Ltd. engages in the ecological environment and garden construction, culture and tourism, and investment and operation activities in China. The company is involved in the landscape planning and design, ecological environment and garden construction, seedling cultivation and conservation, and research activities. It also engages in the cultural tourism and financial investment businesses. The company was formerly known as LingNan Landscape Co., Ltd. and changed its name to LingNan Eco&Culture-Tourism Co.,Ltd. in February 2018.
